snippet.title: SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS – Story Trailer
snippet.description:
A story trailer for SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS is out now!
When a disturbing omen stirs Shadow's memories, he must relive his past.
Black Doom—Shadow's nemesis—reemerges and threatens to take over the world.
Shadow must journey into his past, confront his painful memories, and unlock new dark powers to save the world.

-------------------------------------------------
SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS
Releasing on Oct.25,2024
-------------------------------------------------
▼SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS Official Site
https://asia.sega.com/SonicXShadowGenerations/en/

▼Sonic the Hedgehog Official Website
https://asia.sega.com/SonicTheHedgehog/en/

▼Official SNS
https://www.facebook.com/SonicOfficial.asia
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLD4D9ItnRFUk8Pq859GLSS_mzVf4OIJ8H
